rows.label: tlk44600183_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome! Luxuria is famous for our
carefully handwoven textiles. Don't
be shy, take a good look!

rows.label: tlk44600183_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If you're interested, you should
take a look at the shop next door
too. My daughter runs that one.

rows.label: tlk44600183_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Hello there, Owner! Taken an eye to
Luxuria's fine fabrics, have you?

rows.label: tlk44600183_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Ah, you're an Owner! Please don't
forget to have a look at my
daughter's shop on the other side!
